client_id.description: The unique identifier of the client associated with the project

client_name.description: The name of the client associated with the project

project_id.description: The unique identifier of the project

total_amount.description: The total amount of expenses incurred for the project

billable_amount.description: The amount of expenses that are billable to the client

currency.description: The currency in which the expenses are recorded

from.description: The starting date of the expense record period

to.description: The ending date of the expense record period
